first_para: Sidney Cordle is a British political campaigner, who has been involved in politics for 40 years. He served as a conservative councillor from 1984 to 1988 for Sheffield City Council. He became leader of the Christian Peoples Alliance in 2012.

full.extract:
Sidney Cordle is a British political campaigner, who has been involved in politics for 40 years. He served as a conservative councillor from 1984 to 1988 for Sheffield City Council. He became leader of the Christian Peoples Alliance in 2012.
